jurls.reinforcementlearning.domains.arcade.gui

Class NullUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • jurls.reinforcementlearning.domains.arcade.gui.NullUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractUI

    public class NullUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements AbstractUI
    An empty UI for running console experiments. All abstract methods are implemented to do nothing.
    Author:
    Marc G. Bellemare
